title: Flutter
content:
安装配置

  • flutter

https://docs.flutter.dev/development/tools/sdk/releases

将安装包zip解压（如：C:\src\flutter；注意，不要将flutter安装到需要一些高权限的路径如C:\Program Files\）

  • Flutter to use a mirror site

https://docs.flutter.dev/community/china

  • 配置环境变量

PUB_HOSTED_URL=https://pub.flutter-io.cn

FLUTTER_STORAGE_BASE_URL=https://storage.flutter-io.cn

  • 设置sdk路径

flutter config --android-sdk “C:\Software\Android”

  • cmdline-tools

  • android studio

https://developer.android.google.cn/studio

  • Visual Studio

https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/zh-hans/downloads/

Visual Studio 2022 Professional TD244-P4NB7-YQ6XK-Y8MMM-YWV2J

  • 修改项目文件配置【可省略】

“StudioProjects\myapp\android\build.gradle”

  • 修改配置文件

“flutter\packages\flutter_tools\gradle\flutter.gradle”

maven { url ‘https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/google’ }

maven { url ‘https://maven.aliyun.com/repository/jcenter’ }

maven { url ‘https://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public/’ }
